abstract: Maria Sharapova pulls out of the WTA Championships in Istanbul with sore ankle after losing to Li Na.
snippet: Maria Sharapova pulled out of the WTA Championships in Istanbul with a sore ankle after losing at the season-ending tournament, 7-6 (4), 6-4, to Li Na.
lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova pulled out of the WTA Championships in Istanbul with a sore ankle after losing at the season-ending tournament, 7-6 (4), 6-4, to Li Na.
